DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effectiveness Michigan-type occlusal splint anterior reposition splint patient temporomandibular joint anterior disc displacement reduction .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Stabilizing Splint ( Michigan-type Occlusal Splint ) Versus Anterior Repositioning Splint .
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate effectiveness Michigan-type occlusal splint anterior reposition splint patient temporomandibular joint anterior disc displacement reduction . PICO : Population ( P ) : Patients symptomatic anterior disc displacement reduction . Intervention ( I ) : Michigan splint . Comparator ( C ) : Anterior reposition splint ( ARS ) . Outcome ( O ) : Primary outcome : Patients ' subjective pain experience . Each patient ask rate current bad pain intensity numerical rating scale ( NRS ) 0-10 zero pain ten correspond bad pain patient ever . Secondary outcome : 1 . Maximum mouth opening ( MMO ) . Assessment MMO perform measure distance mm incisal edge upper low central incisor use ruler . 2. lateral excursion . Assessment lateral excursion perform measure distance mm midline upper low jaw 3. protrusion . distance mm incisal edge maxillary central incisor incisor edge mandibular incisor measure maximum protruded position .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adult patient 15 50 year old . 2 . Report pain preauricular region worsen functional activity , chew talk . 3 . Presence disc displacement reduction joint click 4. positive diagnosis unilateral bilateral anterior disc displacement reduction mean magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) . 1. . . 2 . History TMJ surgery . 3 . Individuals osteoarthritis . 4 . Individuals TMD management . 5 . Individuals wear full partial denture . 6 . Individuals major psychological disorder . 7 . Nonreducing dislocation articular disc 8 . Consequences condyle fracture and/or fracture another maxillofacial zone . 9 . Articular pathology systemic nature ( e.g. , rheumatoid arthritis , arthrosis , psoriasis arthritis ) . 10 . Individuals recent history trauma face and/or neck area . Individuals systemic disease affect TMJ
